scripts.build:client: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.resolve('..','Music Web Application','dist');const dst=path.resolve('Backend','client-dist');if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.rmSync(dst,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.mkdirSync(dst,{recursive:true});fs.cpSync(src,dst,{recursive:true});console.log('Copied frontend dist to',dst);}else{console.warn('Frontend dist not found at',src);}"
